ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): registro = widget.Entity
if registro == None: return
if widget.View.Commands["CMD_RATEIO"] != None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_RATEIO"].Visible = registro.EhAditivoAlteracao and registro.EhAditivoCadastrado if widget.View.Commands["New"] != None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = registro.EhAditivoCadastrado if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = registro.EhAditivoCadastrado if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = registro.EhAditivoCadastrado
